text: The Swedish Bandy Association () is the governing body of bandy in Sweden. It organizes the bandy leagues, Elitserien and Allsvenskan for men and Damallsvenskan for women, and the men's and women's national teams. It was established on 5 April 1925, and is based in Stockholm, and is a founding member of FIB, Federation of International Bandy. ==References== ==Other websites== *official website Category:1925 establishments in Sweden Category:Bandy in Sweden Category:Sports organizations of Sweden
title: Swedish Bandy Association
